column3: The Population Police require your attendance at a meeting at eleven o'clock in the town square. You will be issued a new identity card. No other cards or papers will be valid after these cards are issued, Luke said in a rush.

It was about eleven o'clock; and the Enchantress was attired in a delicious deshabillé.
